Name: Check application works correctly and navigate to the Container list view
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Open the application

Verify that it launches correctly

Navigate to the Container list view to ensure it is accessible
Steps (Expected Result): Application works correctly and user is able to navigate to the Container list view

Name: Verify add Container button or link is present
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Navigate to the relevant page

Look for the ' + ' button or link to add a container

Confirm its presence on the page
Steps (Expected Result): The add ' + ' content button or link is present on the page

Name: Verify ' + '  is present on the page as per the design
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Check the page layout

Ensure that the ' + ' icon is visible on the page as per the design specifications
Steps (Expected Result): The ' + ' is present on the page and matches the design specifications

Name: Verify the ' + '  is color same as per design
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Compare the color of the ' + ' icon with the design specifications

Ensure the color matches the design
Steps (Expected Result): The ' + ' is the correct color as per the design specifications

Name: Verify icon added on the ' + '  must be aligned within the button
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Inspect the alignment of the ' + ' icon within the button

Verify it matches the design specifications and is properly aligned
Steps (Expected Result): The ' + ' is properly aligned within the button as per design

Name: Verify ' + '  is enabled/clickable by clicking on the button
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' + ' button

Verify that it is clickable and triggers the expected action
Steps (Expected Result): The ' + ' button is clickable and functions as expected

Name: Verify that the width and height of the buttons used on the ' + '  are as per design
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Measure the width and height of the ' + ' button

Compare with the design specifications to ensure they match
Steps (Expected Result): The width and height of the buttons used for the ' + ' are as per design specifications

Name: Verify ' + '  changed on mouse hover the same as per design
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Hover the mouse over the ' + ' button

Verify that the appearance changes as per the design specifications
Steps (Expected Result): The ' + ' changes appearance on mouse hover as per design

Name: Verify user can be able to open ' + '  functionality by right click on the button
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Right-click on the ' + ' button

Verify that the expected functionality is accessible
Steps (Expected Result): User can open the ' + ' functionality by right-clicking on the button

Name: Verify the whole ' + '  should be clickable not only the button icon
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on different areas of the ' + ' button

Ensure that the entire button, not just the icon, is clickable
Steps (Expected Result): The entire ' + ' button is clickable, not just the icon

Name: Verify close button is working, click on the ' X ' button and the window should be closed
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' X ' button

Verify that the window closes as expected
Steps (Expected Result): X ' button works as expected and closes the window

Name: Verify that all the checkboxes present on the application are on the correct position
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Check the position of each checkbox on the application

Ensure they are positioned correctly according to the design specifications
Steps (Expected Result): All checkboxes are correctly positioned on the application

Name: Verify the width and height of the checkbox
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Measure the width and height of the checkboxes

Compare with the design specifications to ensure they match
Steps (Expected Result): The width and height of the checkboxes match the design specifications

Name: Verify border radius for the checkbox is corner edge
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Inspect the border radius of the checkboxes

Verify that it matches the corner edge design specifications
Steps (Expected Result): The border radius of the checkboxes has corner edges as per design

Name: Verify the background color and the tick on clicking the checkbox
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the checkbox to select it

Verify that the background color and the tick mark appear as per the design specifications
Steps (Expected Result): The background color and tick mark appear correctly when the checkbox is clicked

Name: Verify all the checkboxes are seleble by clicking on the checkbox next to the Containers name title
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the checkbox next to the Containers name title

Verify that all checkboxes are selectable
Steps (Expected Result): All checkboxes next to the Containers name title can be selected by clicking

Name: Verify all the checkboxes are seleble by tapping on the checkbox next to the Containers Name title using the keyboard
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Use the keyboard to navigate to the checkbox next to the Containers name title

Tap on the checkbox and verify that all checkboxes are selectable
Steps (Expected Result): All checkboxes next to the Containers name title can be selected by tapping using the keyboard

Name: Verify the user can uncheck the checkboxes by clicking on them
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on selected checkboxes to uncheck them

Verify that the checkboxes are unchecked as expected
Steps (Expected Result): User can uncheck the checkboxes by clicking on them

Name: Verify if the user can select multiple checkboxes
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on multiple checkboxes

Verify that multiple checkboxes can be selected simultaneously
Steps (Expected Result): User can select multiple checkboxes simultaneously

Name: Verify on page load no checkbox are selected by default and showing tick sign
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Reload the page

Verify that no checkboxes are selected by default and no tick marks are shown
Steps (Expected Result): No checkboxes are selected by default on page load and no tick marks are shown

Name: Verify the checkbox to deselect all can be uncheck it by clicking on the checkbox
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the checkbox to deselect all

Verify that all checkboxes are deselected as expected
Steps (Expected Result): The checkbox to deselect all can be unchecked by clicking on it

Click on the ' Add Container ' button

Name: Verify the desired action performed on click of the ' Publish ' button
Steps (Instructions):

Click on the ' Publish ' button

Name: Verify value ' Delete ' on the 3 buttons ' Actions '  on click shows correctly in the selection window
Steps (Instructions):

Click on the ' Actions ' button

Name: Verify the desired action performed on click of the ' Delete ' button

Click on the ' Delete ' button

Name: Verify the sorting when clicking on the ' Title ' column once
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Title ' column header

Verify that the column is sorted in ascending order
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into alphabetical order (a-b-c-d-e)

Name: Verify the sorting when clicking on the ' Title ' column a second time
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Title ' column header again

Verify that the column is sorted in descending order
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into reverse-alphabetical order (e-d-c-b-a)

Name: Verify clicking on the sorting on the ' Title ' column a third time
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Title ' column header a third time

Verify that the sorting is cleared or reset
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into 'natural' order (a-d-e-b-c)

Name: Verify the sorting when clicking on the ' Mod Date ' column once
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Mod

Date ' column header

Verify that the column is sorted in ascending order
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into added date order (1-2-3-4-5)

Name: Verify the sorting when clicking on the ' Mod Date ' column a second time
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Mod

Date ' column header again

Verify that the column is sorted in descending order
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into reverse-added date order (5-4-3-2-1)

Name: Verify the sorting when clicking on the 'Mod Date ' column a third time
Steps (Instructions):
Go to the app using {{serverURL}}/dotAdmin/#/containers

Click on the ' Mod

Date ' column header a third time

Verify that the sorting is cleared or reset
Steps (Expected Result): The bookmarks sort into 'natural' order (1-2-3-4-5)
